title: Introducing: DAVIDIAN
body:
21 year-old producer, DAVIDIAN, of Nottingham, England is taking house music to new heights.

My first encounter with this wunderkind was his cleverly executed “asthmatic” remix of Destiny’s Child’s track Lose My Breath. I’m still obsessing over it three months later. I just think theres something particularly special about an artist that can still do inventive things in such a saturated music environment.

DAVIDIAN makes music that would turn a basement of New Yorkers into a mess of undulating masses. I say that because I’ve seen it. Maybe its the throbbing bass? Maybe its the pulsating synth? Or maybe its the perfect amount of female vocals that turn an insane instrumental into ecstasy? Hell its probably all three of them. There’s no doubt this kid won’t be staying under the radar long though especially with his latest remix of The Wombats’ song Your Body Is A Weapon which the group posted to their almost 550k followers.

Time to lose your breath…
